title: Beyond the Stars
description: Journey into the unknown as humanity takes its first steps beyond our solar system. A gripping tale of discovery, sacrifice, and the endless quest for knowledge that defines our species.
shortDescription: Journey into the unknown as humanity takes its first steps beyond our solar system...

title: The Last Light
description: In a world where the sun has vanished, a small group of survivors must navigate through eternal darkness to find the mythical Last Light that could save humanity.
shortDescription: In a world where the sun has vanished, survivors search for the mythical Last Light...

title: Tales of the Heart
description: A beautiful anthology exploring the many facets of love, loss, and human connection across different cultures and time periods.
shortDescription: A beautiful anthology exploring love, loss, and human connection across cultures...

title: Echoes of Eternity
description: A mind-bending journey through time and space as a quantum physicist discovers that his experiments have been creating ripples across multiple dimensions.
shortDescription: A mind-bending journey through time and space with quantum experiments...

title: Lost & Found
description: When a young woman inherits her grandmother's antique shop, she discovers that every item has a story and some have the power to reunite people with their past.
shortDescription: A young woman inherits an antique shop where items have the power to reunite people...

title: City of Secrets
description: In the neon-lit streets of a dystopian metropolis, a detective uncovers a conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of government and beyond.
shortDescription: A detective uncovers a conspiracy in a dystopian metropolis...

title: Silent Whispers
description: A deaf artist discovers she can hear the thoughts of people around her through her paintings, leading to both wonderful discoveries and dangerous situations.
shortDescription: A deaf artist discovers she can hear thoughts through her paintings...

title: Rise of Legends
description: Epic fantasy adventure following a group of unlikely heroes as they embark on a quest to prevent an ancient evil from returning to destroy their world.
shortDescription: Epic fantasy adventure with unlikely heroes preventing ancient evil...

title: After the Storm
description: In the aftermath of a devastating hurricane, a small coastal community comes together to rebuild not just their town, but their faith in humanity.
shortDescription: A coastal community rebuilds after a devastating hurricane...

title: Behind the Curtain
description: A behind-the-scenes look at the world of theater, following a struggling playwright as she fights to get her controversial play produced.
shortDescription: A struggling playwright fights to get her controversial play produced...

title: Into the Night
description: A psychological thriller about a insomniac who begins to question reality when the line between dreams and waking life becomes increasingly blurred.
shortDescription: An insomniac questions reality as dreams and waking life blur together...

title: Digital Dreams
description: In a near future where virtual reality is indistinguishable from real life, a programmer must choose between the perfect digital world and harsh reality.
shortDescription: A programmer chooses between perfect virtual reality and harsh reality...
